I'm Alina, an aspiring web developer

This is my portfolio website. Here you can explore my work and skills.

I am currently studying Software Engineering for my Master's degree at Politehnica University of Bucharest. I am passionate about software development and problem-solving, skilled in paying attention to details and working in teams. My studies give me a solid grip on clear communication and collaboration, which are essential for the fast-paced world of software development. Curious about tech and eager to bring my skills to contribute to further projects.

I'm familiar with various programming languages, such as Java, JavaScript, Python, HTML5, CSS and i have experience with both SQL and NoSQL databases.
